title: Eiyuu no Musume to Shite Umarekawatta Eiyuu wa Futatabi Eiyuu o Mezasu (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Elves   Fantasy World   Heterochromia   Loli   Male to Female   R-15   Reincarnation   Shoujo-Ai Subplot   Weak to Strong
author: Kaburagi Haruka   鏑木ハルカ
description:
Reid, a hero who lost his life during in a fight with a demon, was reincarnated as a daughter of a married couple who were his fellow comrades!?

Although he was reborn as a baby again, with “as expected, I couldn’t accept breast milk from my former fellow comrade” in her mind, she refused to receive the breast milk from her new mother who was her former fellow comrade. As a result, she grew into a weak beautiful little girl.

however, Reid realized that the daughter of the hero and the saint could become stronger than anyone. with the experience of her previous life and the talent from her new parents, she had a dream to become a magical swordsman, and also aimed to become a hero again.>
